channel.title: New World Scape
channel.description:
Note: Do not spam saying this is the wrong section, i am [b]NOT[/b] advertising, but talking about the development of my server which is not online yet, informing people of my server under develpoment [b]ONLY[/b], making this topic legal.
[b]Server Name: [/b][i] New World Scape[/i]
[b]Server IP: [/b][i] Server Under Development[/i]
[b]Server Port: [/b][i] Server Under Development[/i]
[b]Hamachi: [/b][i] No[/i]
[b]Online Status:[/b][i] Offline/Under Development[/i]
[b]Server Features: [/b][i] ::commands for commands
Working Kalphite Queen, the second form appears when the first one dies.
The wild is set up like normal RuneScape (So basically not a PK server but theres pking)
Since some people like challenging servers and some like everything given to them, I have done this: You can buy/spawn most of the items, but theres are rares. You need 85 slayer to fight Abyssal Demons, which drop whips. Whips cannot be spawned or bought from shops. The Kalphite Queen is very strong. Drops Dragon Chains and Dragon 2handers. Both of these are nto found in shops or any of the commands. The chance of getting these from a drop are also very low.
Full Range Projectiles
Full Magic Projectiles
Magic Doesn't Always hit NPCs
Melee and Range have a timer so you cannot mass
Magic has a timer so you cannot mass
Each NPC has its own set up drops.
Good places for PKing are using a Glory to teleport to Edgeville and Pk there (Which also has the mage of zamorak who will teleport you to the abyss), Getting ancient magicks and teleporting to Ghorrock, or getting ancient magicks and teleporting to Padewwa and passing through the gates there and PKing. [/i]
[b]Server Staff: [/b][i] Palidino76/Krawks12[/i]
[b]Server Pictures: [/b] [i] [IMG]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u282/NewWorldScape/Screenshot6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u282/NewWorldScape/Screenshot4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u282/NewWorldScape/Screenshot2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u282/NewWorldScape/Screenshot1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u282/NewWorldScape/Screenshot0.png[/img] [/i]

item.title: New World Scape
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

first off whats project blitz, so your saying it has range projectiles? Second off, on most servers projectiles sometimes get an error after awhile, where when you cast a spell you dont hit, you walk up to the npc, and all that happens is the graphic, which i dont no if project blitz does since i dont no what it is. Also, post a link for it so i can see it lol

Read full topic

item.title: New World Scape
item.dc:creator: @Terrordog Terrordog
item.description:
@Terrordog wrote:

lol,its funny that u try to brag whit projectiles that are already in the standart public source project blitz

Read full topic

item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

Right now I dont really need help

Read full topic

@Palidino76 wrote:

Note: Do not spam saying this is the wrong section, i am NOT advertising, but talking about the development of my server which is not online yet, informing people of my server under develpoment ONLY, making this topic legal.

Server Name: New World Scape

Hamachi: No

Online Status: Offline/Under Development

Server Features: [i]
::commands for commands

Working Kalphite Queen, the second form appears when the first one dies.

The wild is set up like normal RuneScape (So basically not a PK server but theres pking)

Since some people like challenging servers and some like everything given to them, I have done this: You can buy/spawn most of the items, but theres are rares. You need 85 slayer to fight Abyssal Demons, which drop whips. Whips cannot be spawned or bought from shops. The Kalphite Queen is very strong. Drops Dragon Chains and Dragon 2handers. Both of these are nto found in shops or any of the commands. The chance of getting these from a drop are also very low.

Full Range Projectiles

Full Magic Projectiles

Magic Doesn’t Always hit NPCs

Melee and Range have a timer so you cannot mass

Magic has a timer so you cannot mass

Each NPC has its own set up drops.

Good places for PKing are using a Glory to teleport to Edgeville and Pk there (Which also has the mage of zamorak who will teleport you to the abyss), Getting ancient magicks and teleporting to Ghorrock, or getting ancient magicks and teleporting to Padewwa and passing through the gates there and PKing.
